variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.enable: Enable or disable the module's functions.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.lightM: Multiplier used to calculate maximum carrying weight before being encumbered from the strength ability score.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.medium: Multiplier used to calculate maximum carrying weight before being heavily encumbered from the strength ability score.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.heavyM: Multiplier used to calculate maximum carrying weight from the strength ability score.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.useVar: Enable automatic speed penalties from carry weight.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.unequi: Multiplier for items when not equipped.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.equipp: Multiplier for items when equipped, can be used to reduce effective weight for armour and weapons.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.profEq: Multiplier for proficient items when equipped, can be used to reduce effective weight for armour and weapons.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.curren: Define the number of coins required to equal 1 unit of weight.
Units displayed in the encumbrance bar.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.lightW: The number of speed units subtracted when lightly encumbered.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.setting.heavyW: The number of speed units subtracted when heavily encumbered.
variant-encumbrance-dnd5e.effect.descrip: Lowers movement by 20 ft., disadvantage on all attack rolls, and disadvantage on strength, dexterity, and constitution saves
Lowers movement to 0 ft., disadvantage on all attack rolls, and disadvantage on strength, dexterity, and constitution saves
